H0.text: In which decade was the English League Cup first contested. 1920's

H1.text: In which decade was the English League Cup first contested. 1930's

H2.text: In which decade was the English League Cup first contested. 1940's

H3.text: In which decade was the English League Cup first contested. 60's

A4.text: The first League Cup was won in 1960–61 by Aston Villa who, at the time, held the overall record for major trophies won in England.

A5.text: The League Cup was introduced in the 1960–61 season.
